fieldUpdates.formula:
IF( ISPICKVAL(Type, "Global Master Data Management"), CaseNumber&": "& RecordType.Name &":"& Subject,
Case( RecordType.Name, "HR", CaseNumber&": "& RecordType.Name &" - "& TEXT(Category_1__c), "OTC - Invoice Number", "OTC - General", "Payroll", CaseNumber&": "& RecordType.Name &" - "& TEXT(Category_1__c), "OTC Billing", CaseNumber&": "& RecordType.Name &" - "& TEXT(Category_1__c), "PTP/AP", CaseNumber&": "& RecordType.Name &" - "& TEXT(Category_1__c) &" - "&Vendor_Name__c&IF(ISPICKVAL(Category_1__c, "TBO Adjustments"), ' - ' & Customer_Name__c, ''), "PTP/AP - PR/PO", CaseNumber&": "& RecordType.Name &" - "& TEXT(Category_1__c), "RTR", CaseNumber&": "& RecordType.Name &" - "& TEXT(Category_1__c), "T&E", CaseNumber&": "& RecordType.Name &" - "& TEXT(Category_1__c), "Claims", CaseNumber&": "& RecordType.Name &" - "& TEXT(Category_1__c), "Tax", CaseNumber&": "& RecordType.Name &" - "& TEXT(Category_1__c), "Brand Registration", CaseNumber&": "& TEXT(Brand__c) &" - "& Project_Description__c &" - PN-"& Project_Number__c, "Compliance Sub Case", Case(TEXT(Type), "Brand Registration", Parent.Subject &" - "& TEXT(State__c), RecordType.Name), "Quote Request", CaseNumber&": "& TEXT(State__c)& " Quote Request" & IF(NOT(ISBLANK(Description)), ' - ' & Description, ''), "Price Posting", CaseNumber&": "& TEXT(State__c)& " Price Posting - "&TEXT(Posting_Date__c), "Price Filing", CaseNumber&": "& TEXT(State__c)&" - "&TEXT(Related_Month__c)&" "&TEXT(Year__c)&" - Price Filing", "Discount", CaseNumber&": "& TEXT(State__c)&" Discount; "&TEXT(Related_Month__c)&" "&TEXT(Year__c)&"; Due "& TEXT(Due_Date__c), "Compliance Inquiry",CaseNumber&": "& RecordType.Name&" - "& TEXT(Type)&" - "& TEXT(State__c), CaseNumber&": "& RecordType.Name&" - "& TEXT(Type) ) )
fieldUpdates.name: Set Case Subject

fieldUpdates.description: Create a workflow rule on Case with criteria that whenever the “Status” field’s value is changed from New to working and if Escalated field’s value is false then the “Status Changed Within SLA” field’s value will be updated to true else it will be false.
fieldUpdates.name: Status Changes Within SLA

rules.fullName: Auto Response Product Information Online Store
rules.booleanFilter: 1 AND 18 AND ((2 AND 3 AND 5 AND 11) OR (6 AND (8 OR 9) AND 3) OR (6 AND (7 OR 10)) OR (12 AND 13) OR (12 AND 15 AND (3 OR (14 AND 17) OR (16 AND 4))))
rules.description: rule to send auto-response for our online store, product information, other inquiry

rules.booleanFilter: 1 AND 2 AND 11 AND (4 OR (3 AND 6 AND 9) OR (3 AND 10 AND 7) OR (5 AND 7 AND 10) OR (5 AND 6 AND 9) OR (5 AND 8))
rules.description: This rule will send an email for sponsorship or charity inquiry and close the case.

rules.fullName: Auto Response Where to Buy %26 Distillery
rules.booleanFilter: 1 AND 9 AND (4 OR ((2 AND 3 AND 5) OR (2 AND 7 AND 8) OR (2 AND 6)))
rules.description: This rule will close the case and send distillery tours & where to buy product template.

rules.fullName: Autoreply for Reopen case after 3 days

rules.description: This workflow executes when a Brand Registration's Due Date is changed after the Kickoff
This workflow executes when a Brand Registration's In-Field Date is changed after the Kickoff

rules.fullName: Canada Queue New Complaint Email Notification
Canada Queue New Inquiry Email Notification

rules.description: If a Single Barrel Order is not completed in 2 hours, so the order will be canceled
Email alert that is delivered to Case Submitter upon assignment of their Escalated case
Email alert that is delivered to Case Submitter upon assignment of their GBS case
Email alert that is delivered to Case Submitter upon assignment of their CS Change case
Email alert that is delivered to Case Submitter upon assignment of their GBS case of outlook origin

rules.booleanFilter: (1 AND 3 AND 4) OR (2 AND 3) OR (1 AND 3)
rules.description: Email alert that is delivered to Case Submitter upon assignment of their CS Inquiry case
Email alert that is delivered to Case Submitter upon closure of their GBS case
rules.formula: AND( IsClosed = TRUE, NOT( OR( ISPICKVAL(Status, "Closed - Abandoned"), ISPICKVAL(Status, "Closed - No Action") ) ),NOT(ISPICKVAL(Origin, "Outlook")), OR( RecordType.DeveloperName = "PTP_AP", RecordType.DeveloperName = "T_E", RecordType.DeveloperName = "PTP_AP_PR_PO", RecordType.DeveloperName = "RTR", RecordType.DeveloperName = "Claims", RecordType.DeveloperName = "Tax", CONTAINS(RecordType.DeveloperName, "GMDM"), CONTAINS(RecordType.DeveloperName, "OTC"), RecordType.DeveloperName = "HR", RecordType.DeveloperName = "Payroll" ), SuppliedEmail!="managedSaaS_support@us.ibm.com", Case_Closed_from_CaseCloseAttachmentPage__c = false )

rules.description: Email alert that is delivered to Case Submitter upon closure of their GBS case
rules.formula: AND( IsClosed = TRUE, NOT( OR( ISPICKVAL(Status, "Closed - Abandoned"), ISPICKVAL(Status, "Closed - No Action") ) ),ISPICKVAL(Origin, "Outlook"), OR( RecordType.DeveloperName = "PTP_AP", RecordType.DeveloperName = "T_E", RecordType.DeveloperName = "PTP_AP_PR_PO", RecordType.DeveloperName = "RTR", RecordType.DeveloperName = "Claims", RecordType.DeveloperName = "Tax", CONTAINS(RecordType.DeveloperName, "GMDM"), CONTAINS(RecordType.DeveloperName, "OTC"), RecordType.DeveloperName = "HR", RecordType.DeveloperName = "Payroll" ), SuppliedEmail!="managedSaaS_support@us.ibm.com", Case_Closed_from_CaseCloseAttachmentPage__c = false )

rules.description: Case Resolution workflow to send case closed email (All Profiles)
Email alert that is delivered to new Case Owner upon transfer of a Case by someone other than the new Owner
rules.formula: ISCHANGED( OwnerId ) && OwnerId <> $User.Id && NOT( ISBLANK( Owner:User.Id ))

rules.description: An email notification is sent to case submitter fro logistics request record type

criteriaItems.value: GBS Outlook,GMDM,GMDM - GL Account Change/Extend,GMDM - Cost Center Create,GMDM - Cost Center Change,GMDM - Customer Hierarchy,GMDM - Customer Maintenance,GMDM - EDW Mapping,GMDM - Materials,GMDM - Rebates,GMDM - Simple Request

GMDM - Vendor Maintenance,HR,OTC - Bailment,OTC - Bailment Error,OTC Billing,OTC - Cancellation,OTC - Commissions,OTC - Correct Invoice,OTC - Credit Approval,OTC - D2D Xfer,OTC - FI Request,OTC - Invoice Number,OTC - Invoice Request
OTC - Manual Invoice Request,OTC - Resend Auto Invoice,OTC - TPM,PTP/AP,PTP/AP - PR/PO,Payroll,RTR,T&E,Tax,Claims

rules.description: Sends an email alert to the Case Owner their case is reopened

rules.fullName: Change Status of Case From New To Open
rules.description: When Agent click on Assign to me for New Status Case then status would be change from new to open.
rules.formula: IF( AND(ISCHANGED(OwnerId), CONTAINS(OwnerId,'005') , TEXT(Status) = 'New', OR( RecordType.Name ='Quality Claim',RecordType.Name ='Consumer Inquiry')), true, false)

rules.description: Escalate unassigned Change Cases created after 3pm at 12:00pm the following day
rules.formula: AND( RecordType.Name = "Changes", CreatedDate > DATETIMEVALUE(TEXT(DATEVALUE(CreatedDate)) & IF( OR(AND( MONTH(DATEVALUE(CreatedDate)) >= 11, DAY(DATEVALUE(CreatedDate)) >= 3),AND( MONTH(DATEVALUE(CreatedDate)) <= 3, DAY(DATEVALUE(CreatedDate)) <= 10)),' 21:00:00',' 20:00:00') ), ISPICKVAL(Status, "New") )

rules.description: Escalate unassigned Change Cases created at or before 3pm at 5:30pm that day; escalate unassigned Change Cases created after 3pm by noon the following day
rules.formula: AND( RecordType.Name = "Changes", CreatedDate <= DATETIMEVALUE(TEXT(DATEVALUE(CreatedDate)) & IF( OR(AND( MONTH(DATEVALUE(CreatedDate)) >= 11, DAY(DATEVALUE(CreatedDate)) >= 3),AND( MONTH(DATEVALUE(CreatedDate)) <= 3, DAY(DATEVALUE(CreatedDate)) <= 10)),' 21:00:00',' 20:00:00') ), ISPICKVAL(Status, "New") )

rules.booleanFilter: (1 AND 2 AND 3 AND 4) OR (5 AND 3 AND 6 AND 4) OR (1 AND 9 AND 8 AND 4) OR (1 AND 7 AND 3 AND 4)

rules.description: (Compliance) When all of a Brand Registration Case's Sub Cases are closed, an email should be sent to the Compliance Coordinator (Owner) in charge of the parent case. This workflow will not fire if the Due Date has passed
Workflow executes when Quote Request Case is marked "Approved"

rules.fullName: Compliant Pro No%2E Updated Within SLA
rules.description: if the “Compliant Pro Number” field’s value is changed and the Escalated field’s value is false then the “Compliant Pro No. Updated Within SLA” field’s value will be updated to true else it will be false.
rules.formula: AND( NOT(ISNEW()), ISCHANGED( Compliant_Pro_Number__c ), Ever_Escalated__c = false )

rules.fullName: Default Case Owner of Order Claim Sub Case
rules.description: Default the owner of the case where the record type is order claim sub case until the parent record has completed their initial SLA
When a Discount Case's Approval Status changes (typically either Approved or Rejected), send out the appropriate email.
rules.formula: IF( AND( ISCHANGED(Approval_Status__c), OR( TEXT(Approval_Status__c)='Approved', TEXT(Approval_Status__c)='Rejected' ) ), true, false )

rules.booleanFilter: (1 AND 2 AND 3 AND 4) OR (1 AND 2 AND 3 AND 5) OR (3 AND 4 AND 6 AND 7) OR (3 AND 5 AND 6 AND 7)
rules.description: Email for email-to-case Order submissions (All Profiles)
An email notification is sent to plant manager when a new quality claim is
primary category as Purchase order inquiries or Purchase requisition inquiries of US/Canada cases assignement to GBS PO queue
Vendor Registration through the company community is rejected

rules.fullName: Germany Queue New Complaint Email Notification
India Queue New Complaint Email Notification
Japan Queue New Complaint Email Notification
rules.description: this workflow is for sending Email to required people when a new complaint case is created for Japan.
This workflow is used to update the junk cases which was not deliverable or having email undeliverable issue, so we are updating these cases to dummy case.

rules.fullName: Mexico Queue New Complaint Email Notification
Mexico Queue New Inquiry Email Notification

rules.description: When an order claim is marked as expedited, an email will be sent to the owner of the case notifying them of this change

rules.booleanFilter: (1 AND 2 AND 3 AND 4) OR (1 AND 2 AND 3 AND 5)
rules.description: Email for email-to-case Order submissions (All Profiles)
Once a Quality Claim is reported with a health concern then an email must go out to the MIMS team
rules.formula: OR( AND( ISNEW(), RecordType.DeveloperName = "Quality_Claim", Health_Concern__c ), AND( RecordType.DeveloperName = "Quality_Claim", NOT(PRIORVALUE(Health_Concern__c)), Health_Concern__c ) )

rules.description: When a Quote request is received from the QuoteRequest@beamsuntory.com, it should send out a communication to Connor O’Brien, Dionicia Sandoval & Kevin Katz
Re-route future cases to SC_NA_OrderChanges if subject equals Job ZNOTC_US_DIS_ZV240_NO_ATP_CHECK,Step 1

rules.fullName: Rest of World Queue Email Notification

rules.description: Field update that triggers the CaseServices class via time-based workflow; this class will update the SLA Start and End Time, Last Status Change, Time with Customer and Time with Support fields at end of day; candidate for scheduled batch class

rules.fullName: Send Email for Complaint Case Creation

rules.description: Field update that sets the Case subject according to the type of Case submitted
Field update that sets the Date and Time that a case is assigned

rules.fullName: Set flag to false on Case reopen

criteriaItems.value: GMDM,OTC Billing,PTP/AP,PTP/AP - PR/PO,Payroll,RTR,T&E,HR,GMDM - Simple Request,GMDM - Vendor Maintenance,Tax,Claims

rules.description: This workflow will revert the flag to false when the case is reopened.
For the Maker's Mark Single Barrel Program once the bottle text has been entered an email will be sent to the Maker's Mark Plant team

rules.fullName: Single Barrel El Tesoro Order Placed
rules.description: Once a Single Barrel Order for El Tesoro is created is will be sent to the plant users

rules.fullName: Single Barrel El Tesoro Order Type Change
rules.description: Once a Single Barrel Order for El Tesoro is created is will be sent to the plant users

rules.fullName: Single Barrel Knob Creek Order Placed
rules.description: Once a Single Barrel Order for Knob Creek is created is will be sent to the plant users
rules.formula: AND( ISPICKVAL(Status,'New'), RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Single_Barrel_Standard', OR( ISPICKVAL(Brand__c,'Knob Creek'), ISPICKVAL(Brand__c,'Cruzan'), ISPICKVAL(Brand__c,'Jim Beam') ), Flow_Completed__c )

rules.fullName: Status field%E2%80%99s value is changed from New to working
rules.description: Create a workflow rule on Case with criteria that whenever the “Status” field’s value is changed from New to working and if Escalated field’s value is false then the “Status Changed Within SLA” field’s value will be updated to true else it will be false.
rules.formula: AND( NOT(ISNEW()), ISCHANGED(Status), ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(Status),"New"), ISPICKVAL(Status, "Working"), Ever_Escalated__c = false )

rules.fullName: Time stamp for SAP entered date

rules.description: Field update that works in tandem with the SLA Workflow to reset the Update SLA Times and Toggle fields

rules.fullName: Update Ever_Escalated%5F%5Fc field on first Escalation
Update Case Status on Acceptance from Queue-GBS
rules.formula: AND( ISCHANGED(OwnerId), LEFT(OwnerId, 3) <> "00G", OR( CONTAINS(RecordType.Name, "GMDM"), RecordType.Name = "HR", RecordType.Name = "PTP/AP", RecordType.Name = "PTP/AP - PR/PO", RecordType.Name = "Bailment", CONTAINS(RecordType.Name, "OTC"), RecordType.Name = "RTR", RecordType.Name = "Payroll", RecordType.Name = "T&E", RecordType.Name = "Registration Approval", RecordType.Name = "Claims", RecordType.Name = "Tax"))

rules.description: This will update the Quote Request SLA Start field once a case is waiting for submission.

criteriaItems.value: Order Claim,Order Claim Sub Case,Quality Claim Sub Case

rules.description: This is the sla start time field for the Entitlment process for Cases of record type Order claims and all GBS Cases

rules.fullName: Update all OTC record types to OTC Billing

criteriaItems.value: OTC - Bailment Error,OTC - Cancellation,OTC - Commissions,OTC - Correct Invoice,OTC - Credit Approval,OTC - D2D Xfer,OTC - FI Request,OTC - Invoice Number,OTC - Invoice Request,OTC - Manual Invoice Request,OTC - Resend Auto Invoi

rules.description: Updated Account state for Single barrel related record type cases
